basics.name: Andrei Matea
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Dedicated and enthusiastic iOS Developer with several years experience in delivering apps from scratch to AppStore release. Worked with many Start-Up project ideeas, but also with leading video industires and IoT clients for apps with milions of users. Strong UI skills gathered along the projects Iâ€™ve been working on including animations, transitions and different/more complex layers; strong knowledge with Bluetooth Low Energy and tracking apps. My empathic spirit helps me adapting quickly to new projects/teams and provides me an advantage in communications both with clients and other teams (e.g. Android) or team members.

work.summary: While working on different projects, but also outsourcing you need to quickly adapt to changes/requests. With every one of them, my knowledge grew; below you have a description of those:
Start-ups mean many and smaller projects, each of them with their unique UI

Bigger projects needs maintenance, more scalability and good project thinking before laying any code lines. Had the chance to work for leading video streaming industries and IoT clients with tens of device types

Since on most of the apps different client requests may come and things may change during the implementation of one feature to another, I've had to grind my social/communicative skills to act in a profesional manner in each situation
highlights: Communication, within the team, but not only
Quick make of decisions based on different project states

volunteer.summary: During the internship each intern had one or two mentros who guided/helped him throughout the process, mostly with technical informations/tips and tricks; pull requests reviews and monitoring his/her progress
highlights: Constant feedback about the progress of an iOS junior

volunteer.summary: We've organized different types of social and gathering events dedicated to UBB students, especially of Faculty of Mathematics and Informatics

awards.title: Most active volunteer
awards.summary: As a sign of gratitude for the dedication, passion and perseverance shown during the event Freshman Ball
